genresAdvancedInfo.name: indie emo rock
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Indie emo rock is a blend of emo and indie rock. It features the emotional lyrics and introspective themes of emo, but with a more upbeat and energetic sound. The music often features distorted guitar riffs and driving rhythms, with vocals that range from soft and vulnerable to loud and intense. The lyrics often deal with topics such as relationships, mental health, and personal struggles.
